short_summary: Deliver food services to Whitehorse Cadet Training Centre
description: The National Defence Department requirements are as follows: ";
full_summary:
## Whitehorse Food Services
### Request for Proposal (RFP) - Expired

#### Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking qualified contractors to provide food services to the Whitehorse Cadet Training Centre in Whitehorse, Yukon Territory.

**Restaurant and Catering Services**
* Contract Term: 2023-2024
* Estimated Contract Value: None disclosed
* Service Period: Continuous during summer operations (July to August)
* Daily Forecast for 2023: 13,285 ration strengths

### Tender Overview
* **Title:** Whitehorse Food Services
* **Tender Number:** WL4022039053- Doc4031692249
* **Tender Status:** Expired (Close Date:  June 9, 2023, at 14:00 hours)
* **Supplies Sought:** Food Services
* **Trade Agreements:** None applicable
* **Region of Delivery:** Yukon

### Service Delivery
Contractors will be required to provide food services to DND operations at the Whitehorse Cadet Training Centre in a continuous and reliable manner during the summer season. The service will be required to cater for an estimated 13,285 ration strengths daily.

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated on the basis of the **Lowest Price** submitted.

### Excluded/Non-Applicable Categories (for Canadian Companies)
* None

### Attachments
None available for this tender announcement.

### Contact Information
Interested Contractors should contact:
* [Kristina Mikulova](mailto:kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### Additional Resources
*   [Full Tender Details (PDF)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16539263?extsite=MTY1MzkyNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Notes
This tender has expired, and no further RFP or Tender documents will be released.
